welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cinfaes, a charming city nestled in the heart of Portugal. Known for its breathtaking landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vila Real Airport is used for the handling of freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viseu Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Viseu Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
